title: Food Politics
description: Now that the conventions are well behind us, the candidates are back out on the trail, where food lurks around every corner. Dan Pashman, host of The Sporkful podcast from WNYC studios, joins the NPR Politics team to talk about the perils of eating on the trail — whether you're a candidate or a reporter. This episode: host/campaign reporter Sam Sanders, White House correspondent Tamara Keith, and campaign reporter Scott Detrow. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
